README:
This Cucumber environment is bundled with:
- PicoContainer DI framework
- JMock2
- Mockito
cyber-dojo.sh:
CLASSES=.:`ls /cucumber/*.jar | tr '\n' ':'`
javac -Xlint:unchecked -cp $CLASSES  *.java
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  # run test classes even if they are inner classes
  java -cp $CLASSES org.junit.runner.JUnitCore \
    `ls -1 *Test*.class | grep -v '\\$' | sed 's/\(.*\)\..*/\1/'`
fi

instructions:
This is an instructor-led exercise.
There are no written instructions.
Your instructor will explain the exercise.
WordFrequency.feature:
Feature: Word frequency

Description: it should output the frequency of words in a block of text

Scenario:

Given "Hello Cukenfest hello"
When I count the words
Then I should see:
  """
  2 hello
  1 cukenfest
  """
